cascading.tap.hadoop
Class Dfs

java.lang.Object
  cascading.tap.Tap<JobConf,RecordReader,OutputCollector>
      cascading.tap.hadoop.Hfs
          cascading.tap.hadoop.Dfs
All Implemented Interfaces:
cascading.flow.FlowElement, cascading.tap.type.FileType<JobConf>, Serializable
public class Dfs
extends Hfs

Class Dfs is a Tap class that provides access to the Hadoop Distributed File System.

Use the URI constructors to specify a different HDFS cluster than the default.

See Also:
Serialized Form
